articles.description: The reign of Joe Root as the No.1 Test batter in the world is over with Marnus Lasbuschagne scaling the heights to claim top billing and lead an Australian domination at the head of the MRF Tyres ICC Men's Test Batting Rankings.

articles.title: Watch: Siraj walks up to BAN batter's face and sledges him, gets befitting reply - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Mohammed Siraj walked up to the Bangladesh's Najmul Shanto to have a few words and engage in a bit of a heated exchange with both players mouthing something to each other. | Cricket
articles.content: Hoping to stay alive in the series, India made a brilliant start in the second ODI against Bangladesh in Mirpur, wrecking the hosts' top order cheaply. At the end of the 19th over mark, Bangladesh we… [+2027 chars]
